name: Mow the Dice (nick-o-las)
description:
Mow the grass. Avoid the moles. Don't crash.
Oh, and rocks might get stuck in your blades. Be careful. 

———

**Resolution is currently broken. We're looking into it**

———

CONTROLS

WASD: Up, left, down, right

Space: Speed up the rocks that get stuck in your motor

———

CREDITS

Code: Stephen Michie

Art: Nick Hintze

Levels: Patrick Pollock

Sound: Mik Hintze

———

The web version of Mow the Dice from the GMTK Game Jam
